languages.text: "Если я буду лениться, они опять сделают со мной... Это!"
"If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"
languages.original_text: "Если я буду лениться, они опять сделают со мной... Это!"

traits.locale_text: "If I get lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"
"If I get lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"
"If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"
"If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"
"If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"

languages.text: “只要我偷懒，他们就会……对我做些什么……再次惩罚我！”
languages.original_text: "If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"

traits.locale_text: “只要我偷懒，他们就会……对我做些什么……再次惩罚我！”

languages.text: 「さぼっていると…また何か…奴らに痛い目に合わされる！」
languages.original_text: "If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"

traits.locale_text: 「さぼっていると…また何か…奴らに痛い目に合わされる！」

languages.text: « Si je tire au flanc, ils me feront... des choses... encore une fois ! »
languages.original_text: "If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"

traits.locale_text: « Si je tire au flanc, ils me feront... des choses... encore une fois ! »

languages.text: «Si me ven holgazaneando... me lo harán pagar... ¡otra vez!».
languages.original_text: "If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"

traits.locale_text: «Si me ven holgazaneando... me lo harán pagar... ¡otra vez!».

languages.text: "Wenn ich nichts tue, machen ... sie wieder ... Dinge mit mir!"
languages.original_text: "If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich nichts tue, machen ... sie wieder ... Dinge mit mir!"

languages.text: "Tembellik edersem... Başıma kötü şeyler gelir... Yine..."
languages.original_text: "If I am lazy, they will... do things to me... again!"

traits.locale_text: "Tembellik edersem... Başıma kötü şeyler gelir... Yine..."
